  • The Data object
  • View page source

The Data objectÂ¶

The Data class acts as a data container. It is used by the DNNLikelihood object and the DNNLikEnsemble object to manage training/validation/test data through the Data.data_dictionary dictionary. See the documentation of the DNNLikelihood object and the DNNLikEnsemble object for more details on how the Data object is used when building the DNNLikelihood.
